Articles.Content:
This mod is quite old and I have abandoned it. If someone would like to take it over please send me a PM, and get to work! I would love to see this mod continue, but I don't have the time nor skill to make this continue.

 

I read the Martian recently, and was very interested by the Chinese Taiyang Shen rocket in it. Recently learning blender, I decided to start development on it. I'm using the Long March 9 as a referance:

Download: https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1192/MajorLeaugeRocketScience%27s%20The%20Martian%20Rockets v0.1

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/projects/the-martian-rockets v0.5

Required:

Procedural fairings not included

UPDATE v0.5:

-KSP version 1.0.5 compadability

-Engine bug fixed???

Creative Commons License

This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.

Known bugs: Please don't spam this page or my pm box with these issues, do tell me though if you find other bugs

No first stage engine effects (Working on it!!)

DeltaV and TWR shown correctly in VAB but not working outside (Unknown how to fix)

Contributers:

MajorLeaugeRocketScience: Leader, PR, Modeling

xxhansonmaxx: Modeling and textures

Tristonwilson12: Texturing and modeling

piggysanTH: Configs

Kartoffelkuchen: Delta IX

Sampa: Tester

CommanderSpock: Tester

If you would like to join the team here is a form! You can expect a pm back in 1-3 days https://docs.google.com/forms/d/15mrbuzjmQHX3DCmRSBTHxudhkJMaQaLQVCzKkU2glAM/viewform?usp=send_form

People who can make rovers and inflatables needed!

Planned Craft:

CZ-9: Done

Delta IX: WIP

Everything else, unkown

 

2,500 downloads?!?!?! Wow!! Thanks guys! This is still an alpha mod!

Edited August 7, 2017 by MajorLeaugeRocketScience
Ah, good luck then!
Thanks!! I finally got positive feedback on one of my threads

I've actually e-mailed Andy Weir (One of my grandparents' friend's kids is friends with him) and he said that the Taiyang Shen's carrier rocket was probably the Long March 9 because the Delta IX was clearly more powerful than a Titan IV (otherwise it would just launch another Cassini..) and both were able to carry the same payload. This also leaves the possibility that the Delta IX is either the new name of the SLS or it's ULA's solution to the SpaceX 9-Raptor rocket.

Long March 5 is also apparently ultimately designed to carry the Shenzhou to lunar flybys or EML-2.

Edited September 7, 2015 by _Augustus_
Augusts, thank you. FINALLY I get some good hype on one of my threads.BTW Augustus do you have texturing experience?

Augusts, thank you. FINALLY I get some good hype on one of my threads.BTW Augustus do you have texturing experience?
No, but tristonwilson12 says he's happy to help you out.
All right I'll ask him about it
hype woo... also. way out subject... but here..
Nice!! Also triston if you want to help send me a pm
I really gotta read this book.
Seriously man go read it before the movie comes out
Ooh, Vulcan!
Vulcan + Cz-9 = hype!!
Should look nice when it's done.
my Vulcan is stockalike... its name is valiant
I would love to make some Chinese rockets, how about including the long march rockets as well?
I will happily help anyone who needs it with balancing the CZ-9.
Will be watching this with great interest!

I'm going to officially start today!!

- - - Updated - - -

If you want to help send me a pm and I'll add you to the OP

Great! I read the book too, it was really great!

I'll see how you will manage stuff here, maybe I can help a bit, though I feel like I'm involved in too many projects already, but who cares, I've got enough time.
I'm home.... And hurt..
What happened Tristonwilson?

What happened Tristonwilson?

They gave me like 4 stitches in like 4 spots.... In my ear

Owwww... Get better soon!!

- - - Updated - - -

I'm thinking of adding a part with snacks support to play the role Taiyang Shen did in the book, any suggestions?
